mapper.select: SELECT A.DT, A.INSTRUMENT_CD, A.FACTOR_CD, B.IRC_CD, B.MRTY_CD, C.CD AS MRTY_LIST_CD, A.GREEK_CD, A.GREEK, A.CCY_CD FROM PROC_DELTAGAMMA_DATA A, IR_INFO B, SYS_CD_MAP C WHERE A.FACTOR_CD = B.FACTOR_CD AND PROC_ID = #{procId} AND IDX = #{idxId} AND C.TYPE = '002' AND C.SRC_CD = B.MRTY_CD AND A.NONCALL_CD = #{nonCallCd}

SELECT DT, INSTRUMENT_CD, FACTOR_CD, GREEK_CD, GREEK, NON_EXERCISE_GREEK, CCY_CD FROM PROC_DELTAGAMMA_DATA WHERE DT > '${startDt}' AND DT < '${endDt}'
AND INSTRUMENT_CD = '#{instrumentCd}'
SELECT DT, INSTRUMENT_CD, FACTOR_CD, GREEK_CD, GREEK, NON_EXERCISE_GREEK, CCY_CD FROM PROC_DELTAGAMMA_DATA WHERE DT= ${dt} AND INSTRUMENT_CD = #{instrumentCd}
